mapper.insert: insert into onedayorders (onedayorder_seq, cust_email, code , sell_email , bookdate, booktime , person , totalprice , realtime , remark) values (onedayorder_seq.nextval, #{cust_email}, #{code} , #{sell_email} , #{bookdate}, #{booktime} , #{person} , #{totalprice} , default , #{remark})
mapper.update: update onedayorders set remark=#{remark} where code=#{code}
